page.title: 06Royal Observer Corp Post
page.content: line to two other posts,one at Brighton and the other at Cuckfield. Cuckfield is the radio post for the three. The Royal Observer Corp is the major part of 'The United Kingdom Warning and Monitoring Organisation'.The men who man the post have to do a number of tasks. They have to monitor and report nuclear bursts and radio active fallout and give warning of an air attack or fallout by siren or by firing a maroon.If a nuclear attack has occurred the men have to carry out mobile monitoring,providing general intelligence of local conditions. The full establishment of the cluster of three posts would be a head observer in charge,a leading observer acting as deputy and post instructor and eight observers.In peace time these men do ordinary jobs.
